title: Data Logger Module
description:
DLOG_STORE_RRD serves for logging (recording) of the 

process values in an RRD database. The data can be passed with the 

modules DLOG_DINT, DLOG_REAL, DLOG_STRING, DLOG_DT. The 

parameter TRIG_M (positive pulse) is used to manually trigger (start) the 

storage of process data. With Parameters TRIG_T an automatic timeï¿¾controlled release can be realized. If the current date / time value divided 

by the parameterized TRIG_T value with residual value is 0, then a Save is 

performed. 

This also ensures that the store is always performed at the same time
name: DLOG_STORE_RRD

input.name: TRIG_M
input.description: Manual trigger for starting data storage

input.name: TRIG_T
input.description: Automatic trigger interval for time-controlled storage

input.name: URL
input.description: URL address of the server where data will be sent

input.name: DTI
input.description: Current date-time value for data logging

input.name: SEP
input.description: ASCII code for the separator of the recorded elements

input.name: Dns_ip4
input.description: IP address of the DNS server

input.name: TIMEOUT
input.description: Time to monitor for data transfer completion

output.name: DONE
output.description: Indicates whether the data transfer completed without error

output.name: ERROR_C
output.description: Error code indicating the nature of any issue encountered

output.name: ERROR_T
output.description: Type of problem encountered during data transfer
